data.ans: Novak Djokovic's ((chance to play for a 10th||tenth Australian Open title was thrown into limbo)) Thursday ((when the country denied him entry)) and ((canceled his visa because he failed to meet the requirements for an exemption to)) COVID-19 ((vaccination rules)).
